wallets.remove_all_wallets_description: You're about to disconnect all your treasure wares. Keep in mind that you will need your secret phrases or private keys to connect them again.
wallets.remove_wallet_description: You're about to remove this treasure ware. Keep in mind that, to use it again, you will need to re-select it from derivables, or use your secret phrase.
wallets.edit_name_disclaimer: Keep in mind that this name works locally for you to easily identify your treasure ware. None of this data is reflected on the blockchain.

create.messageBody:
You will need these words to restore your treasure ware if your browser's storage is cleared or your device is damaged or lost. 

 Never share your secret phrase (or your private keys) with anyone or enter it into any form, as it provides full control of your treasure ware. 

 Qtware Team will never ask for your recovery phrase or private keys.
create.your_seed_phrase_body: Make sure you save the following words in a safe place. Also, keep in mind that the position of each word is important.
create.confirm_seed_phrase_body: Please re-enter the following words of the secret phrase to confirm that you have saved it.
create.wrong_password: Password must be between 8 and 20 characters
create.choose_a_password_body: You will need it to unlock your treasure ware

create.success_message_body: Your treasure ware is now ready
create.derivable_description: Derivables are "sub accounts" that are born from the same secret phrase. Using cryptography, the secret phrase it combined with a derivation path to create these different accounts. It allows the generation of as many accounts as you wish to have under the same secret phrase.

recover.messageBody: Recover your treasure ware using your 12/24 words secret phrase.

You can add other blockchains later from this same menu.
